page.title: 18SHELLEY ... continued
page.content: At 12.0clock we go outside with Mrs Stevens to play all sorts of games. Then we go in for dinner; I have a packed lunch.Afterwards I work in the school shop & I spend my money.In the afternoon we play games and I play with Natasha with,' Shop Around ' it's a money game- it teaches us to do sums.At playtime I play with the same children.Then we have story time with Miss Appleton,which is good. Sometimes she tells people off... I dont like her when she does this.At playtime I rush home and play with my friend Karen we often play schools. I'm usually the little girl and Karen's the teacher. At 6.0clock I go to swimming lessons, I can swim down the deep end.Then we get some chips and go home.At 9.0clock I go to bed and I have a good dream.
